mapper.insert: insert into QnABoard values(QnABoard_SEQ.nextval, #{infoQnA_type}, #{infoQnA_subject}, #{infoQnA_userID}, #{infoQnA_orderNum}, #{infoQnA_email}, #{infoQnA_phone}, #{infoQnA_content}, #{infoQnA_imageName}, sysdate, 0, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from QnABoard order by infoQnA_seq desc)tt)where rn>=#{startNum} and rn<=#{endNum}
